fields.description:
*Android version 4.3* only
Test steps:
1. Install and run KS>Base UI>views>Scroll Views>Scrollable View
2. Click Change

Actual result:
text length does not fit horizontally inside the label

Expected result:
text should fit horizontally inside the label
fields.summary: Android 4.3: Scrollable View - text length does not  fit horizontally inside the label
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.2.201307261628
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.2.v20130730133101
Devices:
Nexus7(2)
Nexus4
Android version 4.3
KitchenSink latest commit e4f5f195722b5f53f8927018d75d35777317b638

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
